description.zh-cn: 中国革命家，杨昌济之女，毛泽东的第二任妻子。
description.en: Chinese revolutionary, daughter of Yang Changji, and the second wife of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A key founder and leader of the Chinese Communist Party, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 杨开慧之父，曾任北京大学教授。
description.en: Father of Yang Kaihui, was a professor at Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 杨开慧之母。
description.en: Mother of Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东与杨开慧的长子。
description.en: The eldest son of Mao Zedong and Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东与杨开慧的次子。
description.en: The second son of Mao Zedong and Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东与杨开慧的幼子。
description.en: The youngest son of Mao Zedong and Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 时任湖南省政府主席，下令逮捕并处决了杨开慧。
description.en: Then Chairman of the Hunan Provincial Government, who ordered the arrest and execution of Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家、革命家、政治家。曾试图保释杨开慧。
description.en: Chinese educator, revolutionary, and politician. He attempted to secure the release of Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 1930年现场参与杀害杨开慧的凶手之一。
description.en: One of the perpetrators who participated in the killing of Yang Kaihui on site in 1930.

description.zh-cn: 由美国基督教教会开办的女子中学。
description.en: A girls' middle school founded by an American Christian church.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的第三任妻子。
description.en: The third wife of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 杨开慧的故乡，原名板仓乡，后为纪念她于1949年后改名。
description.en: The hometown of Yang Kaihui, originally named Bancang Township, it was renamed after 1949 in her memory.

description.zh-cn: 杨开慧的堂妹。
description.en: Cousin of Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 杨开慧是杨昌济的女儿。
description.en: Yang Kaihui is the daughter of Yang Changji.

description.zh-cn: 杨开慧是向振熙的女儿。
description.en: Yang Kaihui is the daughter of Xiang Zhenxi.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济与向振熙于1888年结婚。
description.en: Yang Changji and Xiang Zhenxi married in 1888.

description.zh-cn: 杨开慧是毛泽东的第二任妻子，两人于1920年末结婚。
description.en: Yang Kaihui was the second wife of Mao Zedong; they married at the end of 1920.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸英是杨开慧的长子。
description.en: Mao Anying is the eldest son of Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸英是毛泽东的长子。
description.en: Mao Anying is the eldest son of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸青是杨开慧的次子。
description.en: Mao Anqing is the second son of Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸青是毛泽东的次子。
description.en: Mao Anqing is the second son of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸龙是杨开慧的幼子。
description.en: Mao Anlong is the youngest son of Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸龙是毛泽东的幼子。
description.en: Mao Anlong is the youngest son of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 1928年，毛泽东在井冈山与贺子珍结婚。
description.en: In 1928, Mao Zedong married He Zizhen in the Jinggang Mountains.

description.zh-cn: 杨开慧7岁时入读长沙第四十初级小学（长沙市稻田中学前身之一）。
description.en: At the age of 7, Yang Kaihui enrolled in the 40th Primary School of Changsha (one of the predecessors of Changsha Daotian Middle School).

description.zh-cn: 1920年，杨开慧进入福湘女中学习。
description.en: In 1920, Yang Kaihui enrolled in Fuxiang Girls' Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 时任湖南省政府主席的何键下令逮捕并处决了杨开慧。
description.en: He Jian, then Chairman of the Hunan Provincial Government, ordered the arrest and execution of Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 姚楚忠是1930年11月14日现场参与杀害杨开慧的凶手之一。
description.en: Yao Chuzhong was one of the perpetrators who participated in the on-site killing of Yang Kaihui on November 14, 1930.

description.zh-cn: 据传闻，蔡元培曾向何键发电报，要求保释杨开慧，但未成功。
description.en: According to rumors, Cai Yuanpei sent a telegram to He Jian requesting the release of Yang Kaihui, but was unsuccessful.

description.zh-cn: 1927年，毛泽东准备并组织了秋收起义。
description.en: In 1927, Mao Zedong prepared and organized the Autumn Harvest Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 1949年后，杨开慧的家乡板仓乡为纪念她而改名为开慧乡。
description.en: After 1949, Yang Kaihui's hometown, Bancang Township, was renamed Kaihui Township in her memory.

description.zh-cn: 1918年夏，杨昌济应聘为北京大学教授。
description.en: In the summer of 1918, Yang Changji was appointed as a professor at Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 为悼念杨开慧并回复李淑一而创作该词。
description.en: Authored this poem to mourn Yang Kaihui and in reply to Li Shuyi.

description.zh-cn: 李淑一于1957年春节写信给毛泽东，促使毛泽东回信并附上该词。
description.en: Li Shuyi wrote to Mao Zedong during the 1957 Spring Festival, prompting him to reply with this poem.

description.zh-cn: 杨开英是杨开慧的堂妹。
description.en: Yang Kaiying is Yang Kaihui's cousin.

description.zh-cn: 1930年10月杨开慧在家乡被捕时，杨开英与她一同被捕。
description.en: When Yang Kaihui was arrested in her hometown in October 1930, Yang Kaiying was arrested along with her.

description.zh-cn: 李淑一是柳直荀的妻子。
description.en: Li Shuyi is the wife of Liu Zhixun.
